name: Treatment Center Investment and Valuation Retreat East 2024
content: Whether you are looking to grow your current business and have no plans for M and A activity, or if you are looking to pursue mergers and acquisitions, join us at TCIV East; the ideal event for executives and financial professionals interested in all types of growth strategies. Gain the connections, knowledge, and resources you need to succeed. With an agenda tailored to the growth and future of your business, this premier event is perfect for executives and financial professionals looking to grow, invest in, and transform their treatment center operations. Come learn from and network with the industry's best in Palm Beach Gardens! URLs: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1803669-0?pid=4868 LinkedIn: https://go.evvnt.com/1803669-3?pid=4868 Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/1803669-4?pid=4868 YouTube: https://go.evvnt.com/1803669-5?pid=4868 Instagram: https://go.evvnt.com/1803669-6?pid=4868 Time: 8:00 am - 11:30 am Venue details: PGA National Resort, 400 Avenue of the Champions, Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, 33418, United States Prices: Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Super Saver - Through December 22: USD 1399.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Super Saver - Through December 22: USD 1699.00, Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Early Bird - Through February 16: USD 1499.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Early Bird - Through February 16: USD 1799.00, Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Standard - Through April 14: USD 1599.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Standard - Through April 14: USD 1899.00, Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Onsite - Begins April 15: USD 1699.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Standard - Onsite - Begins April 15: USD 1999.00, Non-Sponsor Vendor Pass - Through April 17: USD 5500.00
